io.neba.core.resourcemodels.metadata

Class MappedFieldMetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.neba.core.resourcemodels.metadata.MappedFieldMetaData

  • public class MappedFieldMetaData
extends Object
    Represents meta-data of a mappable resource model field. Used to prevent the costly retrieval of this meta-data upon each resource to model mapping.
    Author:
    Olaf Otto

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MappedFieldMetaData(Field field, Class<?> modelType)
      Immediately extracts all metadata for the provided field.

      • getField

        public Field getField()
        Returns:
        The accessible Field represented by this meta data.

      • isReference

        public boolean isReference()
        Returns:
        Whether this field is annotated with Reference.

      • isAppendPathPresentOnReference

        public boolean isAppendPathPresentOnReference()
        Returns:
        Whether this field has a Reference annotation with a non-empty append path.

      • getAppendPathOnReference

        public String getAppendPathOnReference()
        Returns:
        the append path of the Reference annotation, or null if either the annotation or the value for the append path are not present.

      • isThisReference

        public boolean isThisReference()
        Returns:
        Whether this field is annotated with This.

      • getPath

        public String getPath()
        Returns:
        The path from which this field's value shall be mapped; may stem from the field name or a Path annotation.

      • getType

        public Class<?> getType()
        Returns:
        the type the resolved value for the field shall have, which is either the field type, or the generic parameter type in case of optional fields.

      • isPathAnnotationPresent

        public boolean isPathAnnotationPresent()
        Returns:
        Whether this field has a Path annotation.

      • isPathExpressionPresent

        public boolean isPathExpressionPresent()

      • isPropertyType

        public boolean isPropertyType()
        Whether the type of this field can only be represented by a resource property (and not a resource).

      • isCollectionType

        public boolean isCollectionType()
        Whether the type of this field is assignable from Collection.

      • isInstantiableCollectionType

        public boolean isInstantiableCollectionType()
        Returns:
        whether this field is a collection type that can be instantiated.

      • isChildrenAnnotationPresent

        public boolean isChildrenAnnotationPresent()
        Whether the field has a Children annotation.

      • isResolveBelowEveryChildPathPresentOnChildren

        public boolean isResolveBelowEveryChildPathPresentOnChildren()
        Returns:
        whether a Children annotation is present with a non-empty Children.resolveBelowEveryChild() path.

      • getResolveBelowEveryChildPathOnChildren

        public String getResolveBelowEveryChildPathOnChildren()
        Returns:
        the Children.resolveBelowEveryChild() path, or null if no such annotation or path exist.

      • getTypeParameter

        public Class<?> getTypeParameter()
        Returns:
        The generic type of this field if it has a generic type declaration, such as List<MyModel> field; or Optional<MyModel> field;

      • getArrayTypeOfTypeParameter

        public Class<?> getArrayTypeOfTypeParameter()
        Returns:
        the array type representation of the component type, or null if the component type is null.

      • getAnnotations

        public Annotations getAnnotations()
        Returns:
        the annotations of the field, never null.

      • isOptional

        public boolean isOptional()
        Returns:
        whether the field is of type Optional.
